SERIES PREMIERE

The planets of our solar system are full of mysteries. Meet a few of the scientists who are using the James Webb Space Telescope to look at our solar system and beyond.

[Watch](https://plus.nasa.gov/video/other-worlds-2/#fullscreen-player)

metadata.ogDescription: The planets of our solar system are full of mysteries. With NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope, scientists are able to investigate clues in brand new ways.
